title: Testing the Arduino Marble Gate
description:

18.00 Friday October 14:th, Free Entrance
Official Info Here:
https://www.landskrona.se/uppleva-och-gora/kultur/kulturnatten/

Testing the Arduino Marble Gate

I will not use electronics for any final machines, only for testing :) The fun problem to solve here is to make a fully mechanical machine play tight and beautifully, as soon as we introduce one electronic component, I´d rather use a MIDI keyboard.
